bibRefCitation.author: Krober, O.

subSubSection.paragraph: Type material . Holotype (examined). ♂ , Queensland : L1: Herberton, Dodd, i.1911 , 3700 ft ; L2 : coll. Lichtwardt; L3 : Holotype ; L4 : Conops ♂ splendidus Kröb. O. Kröber det. 1914 ( DEI ). Paratypes . Queensland: 1♂ , Queensland: L1: Herberton, Dodd, i.1911 , 3700 ft ; L2 : coll. Lichtwardt; L3 : Paratype ; L4 : Conops ♂ splendidus Kröb. O. Kröber det. 1914 ( DEI ); 1♂ : L1: Co-Type; L2: Herberton Dodd, J. 12.1910; L3: CoType No.24295 U.S. N.M.; L4: Conops splendidus Krb Kröber det. 1914 ( USNM ).
